QuestData.Title: Into the Mists
QuestData.Description: <Nazgrim fills his lungs with sea air.>$b$bYou smell that, $n? It's the smell of our home, the lands our kind have bled and died to preserve.$b$bAnd listen... you hear that? It's the sound of peace and safety - a haven we've carved, where our enemies fear to tread.$b$bRemember these things. You won't experience them again anytime soon. We have ourselves a war to win.$b$bNow go get settled, we're shovin' off!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to General Nazgrim on Hellscream's Fist.
QuestData.RewardText: $n!?$b$bThey told me you were dead...$b$bI'm glad to see it wasn't true. There's Alliance to kill!
